Reviews.Title: It's an "Average" Phone
Reviews.Author: Saeed Rezaei
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about a year now. I got it for free with a 2 year contract with Verizon. I guess I can't say much about a free Android phone, but still, this phone has its faults.First off, the phone has a pretty good design. It's not too flashy, but still has a nice and slim design. I like the fact it has physical navigation buttons rather than the touch navigation buttons, that are on most other Android Phones. The sound quality is also good. The sound quality is loud, clear, and crisp. The Speaker Phone is also very clear and loud. Plus it's backed up by Verizon's network so you shouldn't have much problem with it. This phone is also pretty durable. I've never bought a case for it and I've dropped it around a few times on some hard surfaces. The phone still looks and works great. The back battery cover and the screen is not prone to any scratches.Now for the many faults of this phone. First off, It states that this phone can do 20+ Days of Stand By and 7.5 Hours of Talk, but I highly doubt this phone can pull it off. Obviously it was tested in certain conditions, but for average users like me, you'll never get anywhere near those numbers.  Next is the phone's processing power. This phone does not have a good processor. The phone has a 600MHz Processor, which is the equivalent to an iPhone 3GS, but is no where close to running as smooth as a 3GS. When you're simply just navigating through menus, there is always a little delay and you see some screen tearing. Things take some time to load up and the phone freezes A LOT! What's worse is that playing most games on the phone is awful! I try to play a simple game of Angry Birds or Fruit Ninja and the phone lags like crazy! It's almost unbearable to play games with this phone. It also doesn't help that the touchscreen is not that responsive. It's "OK," but not great. Another big flaw is that the browser on this phone does not have Adobe Flash Support, which basically blocks you off from most of the glory of the web. Of coarse there are Apps for certain sites like YouTube or Facebook, but I wish they just included Flash. The phone comes with 3.2 MP Camera, but the quality is not that good. The controls for it are bad, there's no flash, and pictures come out blurry unless you really try hard to keep your hand. What's worse however is that LG does not have much support from the Android community. There are a some apps that don't work with the phone and LG stopped supporting the phone long times ago.Overall, this phone isn't the best, but you could do a lot worse. Plus it's cheap price justifies its flaws. You really don't find 2.2 Android Phones for free. It's a good entry line phone with Android 2.2, but for someone that wants a really smooth and fast phone, with Flash Support, and a good camera, you might need to look else where.

Reviews.Title: Good entry level Android phone
Reviews.Author: Richard Keeler
Reviews.Content: In general this is a great phone for the price.  My only complaints are:1) The keyboard isn't quite as easy to use as I expected, although the Swype technology helps2) As you're typing a text message, you can only see 2 lines of your message at a time, so you have to scroll up and down to proof-read, which is a little annoying3) The battery life seems pretty short - occasionally less than a day with normal usage.  I may try changing some app settings and whatnot to see if I can improve that.But overall, I would recommend it if you're on a budget.

Reviews.Title: This phone is great ... If you want a phong that doesnt work.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Its not good at all. Do not buy. I just made the leap into smartphone world with this phone. I am actually consider going back to a.flip phone. a lot of apps are not compatible due to old software. The phone stalls all the time and forces me to do a "force close" on apps. Absolutly no internal memory. Already filled with preloaded apps and software. I would necer recomend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price
Reviews.Author: Amy Ren
Reviews.Content: It's ok for what it is which is one of the cheaper smartphones that you can get with no contract. I got this when I lost my phone and didn't have an upgrade available. It seems to struggle technically when trying to run some apps (turn by turn directions just did not work for example) and frequently run low on storage space because many apps can't be moved to the SD card, but it gets the basics like phone, text and email done if you need it. I was glad to trade it in for a higher end phone when my contract was up for renewal/upgrade.

Reviews.Title: An Okay Phone
Reviews.Author: Glowe
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because I needed to upgrade from my env2, which I had had since 7th grade (I am a senior now). When I first got it I was pretty impressed- it worked great, the interface was pretty intuitive- but then I started to notice a few things about it that I was not so pleased with. I downloaded a few apps and, next thing I know, the phone was telling me that my internal memory was full, and my text memory was full. It would not send a text message until I fixed this problem. I found myself constantly being kicked out of apps, always fighting the memory (which was always above 1.5 gb, even when it was telling me it was full), and always having to erase all of my texts. The second problem I had with this phone is that it was always overheating while plugged in, and would only be 20% charged after a few hours. I finally found that I needed to keep everything off of it, so that nothing covers even a little portion of it, while it is charging. Maybe I just had a bad expierience with this phone, but it seems to me that older android phones all have the memory issues, and the battery issues. However, this is a good simple, multi-messaging phone, as it did work fine for texting, calling, and sending pictures. The e-mail app works great after you set it up, and I found that it was a good music player as well if you are looking for an alternative to an mp3 player. I would suggest that, if you do put music on it, you get an SD card with a decent capacity. I would also suggest putting most of your apps on the SD card as well, if they will work on the SD card.

Reviews.Title: mommas got her own phone back :)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jessynvanessa"
Reviews.Content: works. My kid can play on it without service. Download games and have fun. He wont need to borrow my phone anymore yay!

Reviews.Title: Would buy again .....
Reviews.Author: Vallery
Reviews.Content: I gave this a  3  because I did have a problem when I first received the phone. I called them right and they responded quickly, and mailed out one  immediately. And received it in two days,  cell phone itself was in excellent condition as  posed it to price was excellent I feel that they should pay a little more attention to details of a phone before shipping it out

Reviews.Title: basic
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: bought this for my mom - its working fine for daily use and gets good reception - not a fancy new smart phone but reliable enough with basic smart phone features

Reviews.Title: Not as described
Reviews.Author: Maria Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The item was horrible. It was nothing like it was described.  It said it was barely used and that it was almost new. Well it is all scratched up front and back and some of the buttons didn't even work on it I thought it was a practical joke when I first saw it.

Reviews.Title: LG Vortex VS660 Cell phone
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Ahern
Reviews.Content: bought this phone to replace one of the same  model that i have had for over 2 years.that is all.

Reviews.Title: good starter phone
Reviews.Author: Pothead81
Reviews.Content: this is great for a teen just begining to learn the cellular dizziness that is tecnolgicaly advanced for todays world

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: CarolannieFannie
Reviews.Content: I'm going to buy a new phone. this one is still in perfect condition from when I first got it. the resetting itself didn't bother me at first but now its way too frequent. the phone itself is nice but the program is old too. I could have put the 80 from this phone into a better one and saved money.

Reviews.Title: LG Vortex
Reviews.Author: Tracy Grantham
Reviews.Content: It was scratched up pretty bad and didn't come with a charger. Wouldn't buy another one of these. Not what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone purchase
Reviews.Author: Sandra D. Miliner
Reviews.Content: I had an LG before.  We changed cell phone carriers and I got a very basic phone and discovered I hated it.  The carrier would not work with me on getting it changed without either paying full price or waiting until contract came up in another 18 months.  So I took matters into my own hands and went to amazon to purchase this one.  The only problem I have had with it, is that it has to be charged every night even it I have not used it!  I keep it on all the time but it does go to sleep after a short time.  Maybe I will look into a new battery for it,  it may help.  I would highly recommend this brand and when time comes to upgrade it most likely will be another LG

Reviews.Title: Don't
Reviews.Author: cochise8933
Reviews.Content: Deciption! Verizon does not offer hot spot on this phone. Reason I purchased it. Better off going to Verizon store, and getting phone with  all features working. Phone came without battery. Clayton was a dick!

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: R. Slone
Reviews.Content: My wife is relunctantly tip toeing into what ever century we are in. She is slowly picking up on the workings of an android smart phone. I think she's having fun at it  but hasn't had it very long. It fits her hand fine, the battery seems to last longer than my Droid X  between charges. I hope time doesn't have any bad news in the future.

Reviews.Title: do not like the phone
Reviews.Author: viva
Reviews.Content: The phone stop working.  Can't turn  on or off. Just stop working. Will send it back.  I also found The phone very slow.and would freeze often.

Reviews.Title: Lg VS660
Reviews.Author: M.W.
Reviews.Content: Hi My name is M.W. I purchased a  LG VS660 Vortex Cell Phone, Android Touch Screen.the battery does not hold a charge I charged the battery full did not speak nor email or text to much half way through day needed to be recharged. The battery does not look new. I'm also having a problem that the phone pairs with my parrot Bluetooth however when i make a phone call it shuts off.

Reviews.Title: Works and Looks GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Gshockra
Reviews.Content: Great Product. Thank you! Everything works as described, Phone was brand new as described. No complaints from me. Great job, keep up with the good business.

Reviews.Title: Phone Better than Original!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived quickly and was easily brought up to speed using my already in place contract.  The phone has more space than my original phone and made the change easily.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: msclayborne
Reviews.Content: I love LG products. They're indestructible, and whenever I hear the word LG, I automatically think of a trusted and reputable company. I mean c'mon, they make great products: TV's, washer and dryers, refrigerators, etc..HOWEVER,This phone absolutely sucks.It is always freezing up.I am always running out of space for my apps (I have a total of six, but only because I have to keep my number of text messages low)Lock button get stuck.The button paint is coming off.NO flash. very inconvient.Pictures take forever to load up.Doesn't always recognize my SD card.Data turns off when I have FULL service.Doesn't always connect to WiFi.A bunch of annoying problems.All in all, the phone is slow and sucks.DO NOT PURCHASE!!There are newer, much nicer, phones that have come out, such as the Samsung Rezound.This phone has been on the market since 2010. The Android OS on this phone is out of date.DOES NOT HAVE ICECREAM SANDWICH.Ladies and gentlemen: don't be like me, an unhappy customer stuck in a 2-year contract. Just don't buy the phone. Save yourself the headache..

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone!
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: This is by far my best cheapest android phone. For beginners its great but for adults I suggest bigger and more expensive

Reviews.Title: Starter Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Phoebe-Lee-Bee "Pheebs"
Reviews.Content: This was my first smartphone, and I have to say, I was very pleased. I would recommend it for anyone beginning with one. The only complaint is the phone freezes or shuts down, but that's most likely because I have run too many applications at once, and well because it is STILL an LG.

Reviews.Title: The phone restarts!!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It's a pretty good phone however it randomly restarts itself.  Not sure why because I have had 2 previous and never had a problem.  It is managable just irritating!!

Reviews.Title: junk junk junk
Reviews.Author: jeremy lewis
Reviews.Content: Phone is complete junk not even worth the effort of sending back phone locks up even with no warning stops recieving calls and text complete junk

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: pup
Reviews.Content: its kinda glitchy and heavy it freezes up sometimes and looses charge real quick lets see here ill rate in stars fastness 4 stars durability 5 stars battery life 3 stars internet browsing 4 stars overall 4 stars i have dropped this phone so many time and still not one scratch i would suggest a rubber casing though

Reviews.Title: nice phone for the price
Reviews.Author: delon
Reviews.Content: This phone is well worth it. Don't listen to the other reviews about the negative feedback about this phone. Just get it.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Tom Eaves
Reviews.Content: LG's vortex vs660 stands out from the market competitors.  Beats all other smart phones of its generation.  I bought this one for my wife and can't get her to trade me for my LG (older flip phone)

Reviews.Title: sweet Lisa
Reviews.Author: corp
Reviews.Content: I love it. Trying to get use to how it works but it is a nice cell phone.  I don't use my cell phone for email but it comes in handy when someone is emailing me and they want to get in touch with me right away. I would give this a 5

Reviews.Title: refurbished is actually not a bad thing
Reviews.Author: butterfly75
Reviews.Content: I just want to say that I was skeptical about a refurbished cell phone. I couldn't afford to go buy a new cell phone so I went on Amazon. I have to say it was a great idea. The phone was for my husband n he's very picky about his phones. Well he is happy with the phone which means I'm happy. Thank you for making things affordable n actually work.

Reviews.Title: Works fine!
Reviews.Author: Coko Devine "Lighten up! life's to short to a...
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my brother and he said he likes it I opened and it worked just fine, its hard to buy used eletronics because I dont trust it works this made me feel a little more comfy about doing so.

Reviews.Title: no htc
Reviews.Author: williamaulwes
Reviews.Content: they said it was a htc which it's not can't get 3g and the phone is small so it hangs in my shirt

Reviews.Title: Good price, for a good phone
Reviews.Author: APPLERITZ6
Reviews.Content: This Product that I purchased was at great value. The phone was at a decent price. Not only that, but i received two batteries and a memory card. WICKED! The only thing i had an issue with was with tracking my package. Other than that, i am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Brand New
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I used one day shipping was on my door step the next morning.... I got this as a 2nd phone because my first phone ended up in some water no longer then 2 to 3 seconds it still works but on the screen you can tell some moister got behind the screen and when you bring up a white page or something you can see it and it makes your eyes cross... so my first phone was from verizon havent had it for more then a month but i did not have insurance on it so i did not bother with trying to send it in and all that junk... So i was just gonna order another from them but not up for an upgrade so i would of had to pay 309.00 dollers so i found this one on amazon for around 100 + but no higher.... I do have to say it was a good buy and i'm happy with it.... If you have verizon just follow activation steps and you shouldnt have a prob yes this phone is only for the verizon network.... activation for me was very easy i did it on there website and it went threw with no probs it hooked in to my plan and contract with out no prob.... i can do every thing i did with the old one with this one just minus the blotched water stained screen .... It's easier to see with out my eyes crossing now..... I would recomend this.... if you need it get it...

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use Android 2.2-powered 3G smartphone with touchscreen display and virtual onscreen keyboard (including Swype enhancement)
Access to Google services; Bing Search and Maps enabled; can be used as a 3G Mobile Hotspot for up to five Wi-Fi connected devices; VZ Navigator capable
Wi-Fi networking; 3.2-MP camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion; HTML web browser
Up to 7.5 hours of talk time, up to 500 hours (20+ days) of standby time; released in December, 2010
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No Contract Required. Includes: Phone, Battery, Wall Charger. ***Verizon Data Plan Required***
ProductInfo.Name: LG Vortex 3G Touch Android Black Cell Phone - Verizon or PagePlus
